meanings.definition: To enlist new members or employees
meanings.sent1: The football team is recruiting new players for the upcoming season.
meanings.sent2: The company is actively recruiting talented individuals to join their team.
meanings.sent3: After many failed attempts at recruiting, the team finally found a star player.
meanings.sent4: She was like a skilled recruiter, effortlessly recruiting top talent for the company.
meanings.sent5: Recruiting the best candidates requires patience and persistence.

meanings.definition: The action of finding new people to join a company or organization
meanings.sent1: The recruiting process can be challenging but rewarding for companies.
meanings.sent2: She excels in the field of recruiting, always finding the perfect match for the job.
meanings.sent3: The recruiting event turned into a fun social gathering for all participants.
meanings.sent4: His charisma and charm make him a natural in the world of recruiting.
meanings.sent5: The success of the company depends on effective recruiting strategies.
